text: Aporosa bourdillonii is a species of plant in the family Phyllanthaceae. It is endemic to India (Southern Western Ghats (Kerala)). It prefers evergreen and semi-evergreen forests. ==References== ==External links== * http://indiabiodiversity.org/species/show/7728 * http://www.biotik.org/india/species/a/aporbour/aporbour_en.html Category:Flora of India (region) bourdillonii Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Aporosa bourdillonii
